all_answers.question: What is a viable business
all_answers.subject: Business
all_answers.text: Viability in a business is measured by if it will have a sustainable amount of profits overtime and if the business is having a long-term survival rate. A viable business can survive for years due to its annual profits. Viability is based upon profits.
